WorldUtilityStats.cc

00015 
00016 #include "WorldUtilityStats.h"
00017 #include "Packet.h"
00018 #include "BaseLayer.h"
00019 #include "FindModule.h"
00020 
00021 Define_Module(WorldUtilityStats);
00022 
00023 void WorldUtilityStats::initialize(int stage)
00024 {
00025   BaseWorldUtility::initialize(stage);
00026   if(stage == 0) {
00027     recordVectors = par("recordVectors");
00028     bitrate = par("bitrate");
00029 
00030     bitsSent = 0;
00031     bitsReceived = 0;
00032 
00033     //register for global stats to collect
00034     FindModule<>::findNetwork(this)->subscribe(BaseLayer::catPacketSignal, this);
00035 
00036     sent.setName("Bits generated");
00037     rcvd.setName("Bits received");
00038   }
00039 }
00040 
00041 
00042 void WorldUtilityStats::receiveSignal(cComponent */*source*/, simsignal_t signalID, cObject *obj)
00043 {
00044   Enter_Method_Silent();
00045   if(signalID == BaseLayer::catPacketSignal)
00046   {
00047     const Packet* p = static_cast<const Packet*>(obj);
00048     double nbBitsSent = p->getNbBitsSent();
00049     double nbBitsRcvd = p->getNbBitsReceived();
00050     bitsSent     += nbBitsSent;
00051     bitsReceived += nbBitsRcvd;
00052 
00053     if(recordVectors) {
00054       sent.record(bitsSent);
00055       rcvd.record(bitsReceived);
00056     }
00057   }
00058 }
00059 
00060 void WorldUtilityStats::finish()
00061 {
00062   recordScalar("GlobalTrafficGenerated", bitsSent, "bit");
00063   recordScalar("GlobalTrafficReceived", bitsReceived, "bit");
00064 
00065   if (bitrate) {
00066     recordScalar("Traffic", bitsSent / bitrate / simTime());
00067   }
00068   else {
00069     recordScalar("Traffic", bitsSent / simTime());
00070   }
00071   double hosts = simulation.getSystemModule()->par("numHosts");
00072   if(!par("bcTraffic"))
00073     hosts = 2;
00074   if (bitrate && hosts > 1) {
00075     recordScalar("Usage", bitsReceived / bitrate / simTime() / (hosts-1));
00076   }
00077   else {
00078     recordScalar("Usage", bitsReceived / simTime());
00079   }
00080 }
